sourcesContent:
import { Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay } from "@chakra-ui/modal";
import { Box, Stack, Input, Button, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { VFC } from "react";

type Props = {
    onClose: () => void;
    isOpen: boolean;
}

export const SignupModal: VFC<Props> = (props) => {
    const {onClose, isOpen} = props;

    return (
        <Modal onClose={onClose} isOpen={isOpen}>
            <ModalOverlay>
                <ModalContent>
                    <ModalHeader>ユーザー登録</ModalHeader>
                    <ModalBody>
                        <Box my={2} p={6}>
                            <Stack spacing={3}>
                                <Box>
                                    <Text p={2} fontWeight="bold">E-Mail</Text>
                                    <Input borderColor="gray.300"/>
                                </Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <Text p={2} fontWeight="bold">Password</Text>
                                    <Input borderColor="gray.300"/>
                                </Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <Text p={2} fontWeight="bold">ユーザー名</Text>
                                    <Input borderColor="gray.300"/>
                                </Box>
                            </Stack>
                            <Box mt={8} mb={2}>
                                <Button backgroundColor="teal.200" _hover={{opacity: "0.7"}} w="100%">登録</Button>
                            </Box>
                        </Box>
                    </ModalBody>
                    <ModalCloseButton />
                </ModalContent>
            </ModalOverlay>
        </Modal>
    )
}
